did.abstract: One catalogue published in 1926 by the New York City Compstroller's Office featuring descriptions and photographs of property in all five city boroughs going up for sale at a public auction, as well as an advertisement for 600 property lots in Flatbush going up for sale at public auction.

arrangement.p: This small collection is housed in a single folder with no particular arrangement.

prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); New York City public property auctions catalogue and advertisement, ARC.261, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level. This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2024.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One catalogue published in 1926 by the New York City Compstroller's Office featuring descriptions and photographs of property in all five city boroughs going up for sale at a public auction. Also included is an advertisement released in 1924 by Jeremiah Johnson Jr. Co. Real Estate Auctioneers for 600 property lots in the Brooklyn neighborhood of Flatbush going up for sale at public auction.
